channel.title: Zanarith Oldchool PK
channel.description:
[CENTER][b][size=18pt][url=http://Zanarith.com]Zanarith.com[/url][/size][/b]
[B]What is Zanarith?[/B]
[b]Zanarith[/b] is a server started by a group of friends that was on a search for a perfect private server. That group of friends came together with their ideas of a perfect server, and put them all in one. Thus Zanarith was born.
[b]Zanarith[/b] will contain multiple worlds, Ones for quick pking, Ones for Economy. So if you don't like Pking check out the Economy world! or vice versa! As of now, Zanarith's Developers are working hard for your pure enjoyment!
[b]Membership:[/b] [b]Zanarith[/b] is a free to play server, no membership is needed. Being a member does allow you to obtain items quicker, along with better drop rates. Thieving from the home stall jumps from 10k-50k a thieve to 10k-80k You will also obtain 2 pk points per kill, instead of 1. You also have the ability to use the ::yell command. And you can use the gamble options in the quest tab!
[B]Zanarith's Coders:[/B] Mod Woof Mod Meow Mod Mchood
[B]Progress?[/B]
PK/Eco World - 100% (ONLINE)
Eco World - 45% (OFFLINE)
2005 World - 10% (OFFLINE)
[B]Pictures:[/B] PK WORLD
Thieving(10k-55k randomly) *with a chance of a 2-8m jackpot! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/guwGbT8.png[/img]
Shops [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZPSN77n.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0lMawQl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pnHPJZn.png[/img]
Command tab: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ziEwuz2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1xwvdvy.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6t6EyAo.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dMLbfgO.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zsYAtl7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bnQdJ5C.png[/img]
Duel arena: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/K6ujnjZ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YpGjid2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ScMcBXj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VmpBfLz.png[/img]
Login: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AKErpp1.png[/img][/CENTER]

item.description:
@uberape wrote:

[CENTER][size=18pt]Zanarith.com[/size]

[B]What is Zanarith?[/B]

Zanarith is a server started by a group of friends that was on a search for a perfect private server.
That group of friends came together with their ideas of a perfect server, and put them all in one.
Thus Zanarith was born.

Zanarith will contain multiple worlds, Ones for quick pking, Ones for Economy.
So if you don’t like Pking check out the Economy world! or vice versa!
As of now, Zanarith’s Developers are working hard for your pure enjoyment!

Membership:
Zanarith is a free to play server, no membership is needed.
Being a member does allow you to obtain items quicker, along with better drop rates.
Thieving from the home stall jumps from 10k-50k a thieve to 10k-80k
You will also obtain 2 pk points per kill, instead of 1.
You also have the ability to use the ::yell command.
And you can use the gamble options in the quest tab!

[B]Zanarith’s Coders:[/B]
Mod Woof
Mod Meow
Mod Mchood

[B]Progress?[/B]

PK/Eco World - 100% (ONLINE)

Eco World - 45% (OFFLINE)

2005 World - 10% (OFFLINE)
